# MusicalPattern

# MusicalPattern

Represents an abstract musical pattern made out of pitch classes with a certain interval relationship.

Kind: global class

  • MusicalPattern
    • new exports.MusicalPattern(pitchClass, pattern, [info])
    • .pitchClasses ⇒ Array
    • .root ⇒ *
    • .info ⇒ Object
    • .pattern ⇒ Array
    • .raw ⇒ Array
    • .toString() ⇒ String
    • .transpose(interval) ⇒ MusicalPattern

# new exports.MusicalPattern(pitchClass, pattern, [info])

Param Type Default Description
pitchClass PitchClass The pitch class to create the pattern from.
pattern Array The pattern to use.
[info] Object {} Any additional information to save about the pattern.

# musicalPattern.pitchClasses ⇒ Array

Returns an array of the pitch classes.

Kind: instance property of MusicalPattern

# musicalPattern.root ⇒ *

Returns the root pitch class.

Kind: instance property of MusicalPattern

# musicalPattern.info ⇒ Object

Returns the information object the pattern was created with.

Kind: instance property of MusicalPattern

# musicalPattern.pattern ⇒ Array

Returns the pattern it self.

Kind: instance property of MusicalPattern

# musicalPattern.raw ⇒ Array

Returns an array of the raw pitch classes.

Kind: instance property of MusicalPattern

# musicalPattern.toString() ⇒ String

Returns a string of the musical pattern's pitch classes.

Kind: instance method of MusicalPattern

# musicalPattern.transpose(interval) ⇒ MusicalPattern

Generates a new chord with the interval applied

Kind: instance method of MusicalPattern

Param Type Description
interval Number the interval to apply
